gettingStarted.title: 🌱 Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: FazendaRPG is a farm simulation game inspired by RuneScape and FarmRPG. Build your farm, grow crops, level up and become the best farmer!
gettingStarted.menuNavDesc: Click the 3-line button (☰) in the top right corner to open the menu
gettingStarted.clickInteractionDesc: Click on farm plots, inventory items, NPCs and other elements to interact
gettingStarted.mobileFriendlyDesc: The game works perfectly on mobile! Tap the screen to interact
gettingStarted.installAppDesc: In your browser, use "Add to home screen" to install as PWA
gettingStarted.firstFarmDesc: You start with a small farm of 9 plots where you can plant crops. Here's how to start:
gettingStarted.step1Desc: Use the side menu (☰) and click on Inventory. You start with:
gettingStarted.step2Desc: Go back to the Farm (side menu) and click on an empty plot (brown square)
gettingStarted.step2Desc2: Select Wheat and confirm. You'll spend 2 energy ⚡
gettingStarted.step3Desc: Wheat takes 30 seconds to grow. You'll see the stages:
gettingStarted.step3Desc2: Tip: Use fertilizer to reduce time by 50% (15 seconds)!
gettingStarted.step4Desc: When the wheat is ready (🌾), click on the plot and select Harvest
gettingStarted.step5Desc: Go to the Market (side menu) and sell your wheat for 5 gold
gettingStarted.step5Desc2: Use the gold to buy more seeds and expand your farm!
gettingStarted.energyTip: 💡 Tip: Rest at the Tavern to recover energy faster!
gettingStarted.progressionItem1: Level Up: Gain XP by planting, harvesting and selling
gettingStarted.progressionItem2: Unlock Crops: New crops become available at higher levels
gettingStarted.progressionItem3: Earn Gold: Sell your products and accumulate wealth
gettingStarted.nextStepsDesc: Now that you know the basics, explore:
gettingStarted.nextStepsItem1: 🌾 Crops Guide: Learn about all available crops
gettingStarted.nextStepsItem2: ⚙️ How to Play: Understand all game mechanics
gettingStarted.nextStepsItem3: 👥 NPCs: Meet the characters and their quests

gameMechanics.title: ⚙️ How to Play
gameMechanics.mainMechanicsDesc: FazendaRPG combines farming, RPG and skill progression elements. Here's everything you need to know:
gameMechanics.farmingDesc: The heart of the game is the cultivation system:
gameMechanics.farmingItem1: Farm Plots: You start with 9 empty plots
gameMechanics.farmingItem2: Plant: Click on an empty plot and select a seed
gameMechanics.farmingItem3: Growth: Each crop has a specific growth time
gameMechanics.farmingItem4: Harvest: When ready, click and harvest to receive the item + XP
gameMechanics.farmingItem6: Weeds: Appear randomly and must be cleared
gameMechanics.energyRegenItem4: Meals: Buy food at the Tavern to recover energy
gameMechanics.skillsDesc: The game has a robust skill system:
gameMechanics.xpItem1: Each action gives XP in the corresponding skill
gameMechanics.xpItem2: Required XP increases with each level
gameMechanics.inventoryItem3: Sorting: Sort by name, quantity or value
gameMechanics.marketTab1: Buy Tab: Purchase seeds, tools and materials
gameMechanics.marketTab2: Sell Tab: Sell your crops and items for gold
gameMechanics.marketFeature2: Prices: Each item has a buy and sell value
gameMechanics.marketFeature3: Sell All: Sell multiple items at once
gameMechanics.npcFeature1: Dialogues: Talk to NPCs to learn about the world
gameMechanics.npcFeature4: Gifts: Give items to increase friendship (coming soon)
gameMechanics.tip1: 🌱 Plant fast crops (wheat) to level up quickly at the start
gameMechanics.tip2: 💰 Sell your crops regularly to accumulate gold
gameMechanics.tip3: 🌿 Use fertilizers on slow crops to save time
gameMechanics.tip4: ⚡ Manage your energy! Don't spend it all at once
gameMechanics.tip5: 🧹 Clear weeds as soon as they appear
gameMechanics.tip6: 📊 Focus on one skill at a time for more efficient progression
gameMechanics.tip8: 💾 The game auto-saves, but you can make manual backups

farm.title: Your Farm
farm.needTrowel: You need a Hand Trowel to plant seeds!
farm.needWeedTool: You need a Hoe or Rake to clear weeds!
farm.weedsGrown: Weeds have grown on the plot
farm.allPlotsHaveWeeds: All empty plots have weeds! Clear them before planting.
farm.someHaveWeeds: plot(s) with weeds will be ignored.
farm.noEmptyPlotsAvailable: No empty plots available to plant

farming.name: Farming
farming.description: Plant and harvest crops to gain farming experience.

mining.name: Mining
mining.description: Mine stones and precious ores from the depths of the earth.

fishing.name: Fishing
fishing.description: Catch various types of fish in rivers and lakes.

woodcutting.name: Woodcutting
woodcutting.description: Chop trees to obtain wood and logs.

foraging.name: Foraging
foraging.description: Gather herbs, fruits and wild resources.
